### main

>  main (run_once=False)

# Running bot on your server/computer

To run the bot, make sure your env is configured (check `.env.example`)
and then use [`main`](https://callmephilip.github.io/c2i/bsky.html#main)
function

``` python
await main(run_once=True)
```
